{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"When there's a chill in the air, you'll love the comfort, style, and natural, barefoot feel of the Denver."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"This stylish ankle-high minimalist boot packs in 3 cold-weather foes:"}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Water-repellent canvas"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Cozy flannel lining"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"A heat-reflecting warming insole"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"And at only 340 grams each for a men's 42, you might stroll your way through the entire winter and forget you even have them on."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The other reasons you'll love the Denver are its true Xero Shoes heritage:"}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"A wide toe box -- lets your toes spread, splay and move naturally"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Low-to-the-ground design for balance and agility"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Non-elevated, \"zero-drop\" heel for proper posture"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The flexible sole lets your feet bend and move the way they're supposed to"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"High-traction FeelTrue® rubber sole with dual-chevron tread for traction, backed by our 5,000 mile sole warranty"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Lightweight construction for \"barely there\" comfort"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Plus, the Denver is vegan-friendly; there are no animal products used in the Denver."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The winter may be no match for you in your new Denver boots. Live Life Feet First!"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"WE MAKE SHOES SO COMFORTABLE, YOU'LL FORGET THEY'RE EVEN ON."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"If your feet don’t feel as good at the end of the day as they did in the beginning, you haven’t tried the Aqua X Sport.","bold":true,"italic":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Life-changing comfort and superior performance come from letting your feet do what's natural – bend, move, flex and feel."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"All Xero Shoes feature a wide toe box that let your toes spread and relax, a non-elevated \"zero drop\" heel for proper posture, low-to-the-ground design for perfect balance and agility, and a flexible sole that gives you \"just right\" protection so you can Feel the World® as you move in total comfort."}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"INTRODUCING THE AQUA X SPORT FROM XERO SHOES"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"STAYS LIGHT – WET OR DRY"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"
The Aqua X Sport is designed with a breathable mesh upper with a quick-dry lining, non-absorbent tongue, and toe guard drain holes that help you quickly shed water, so it's barely any heavier wet than dry. A women's size 7 is just 5.9oz!
"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"A FAST, FINE-TUNED FIT"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"
Get a comfortable, secured fit with the included speed laces.
"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"PROTECTION THAT FEELS JUST RIGHT."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"
The Aqua X Sport uses the same flexible 5.5mm FeelTrue® sole and 3.5mm dual chevron lugs as the Mesa Trail, providing all-terrain traction and just the right amount of protection and ground feedback for responsive, natural movement through all the elements."}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"WHAT'S NEW ABOUT THE DAYLITE HIKER FUSION?"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"PROTECTION THAT FEELS JUST RIGHT."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"
The Daylite Hiker Fusion features a new 10mm FeelTrue® sole that includes a 3.5mm lugged dual chevron tread that has been re-designed to provide even more grip and control without sacrificing the ground feel and feedback you'd expect from Xero Shoes.
"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"IMPROVED COMFORT AND DURABILITY."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"
We've tucked our Huarache-inspired tension straps under a sleek new welded upper so you can achieve a snug fit with even more splash and abrasion-resistance. At just 11.1 ounces each for a Men's 9, the Daylite Hiker Fusion remains the perfect hiking boot for everyday adventures."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"A FRESH, UPDATED LOOK."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\r\nAvailable in black and a subtle, earthy brown, the new Daylite Hiker is a minimalist hiking boot that is stylish enough to pair with just about any casual or work attire, so you can wear it both on and off the trail."}]}]}

Value: {"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"We’re happy and proud that, as of 2022 we’ve been able to donate over $52,000 USD to support the Tarahumara through the "},{"type":"link","url":"http://www.tchforegon.org","title":"Tarahumara Children's Hospital Fund","target":"_blank","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Tarahumara Children's Hospital Fund"}]},{"type":"text","value":"."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"We make these donations by contributing 5% of the purchase price on our "},{"type":"link","url":"/products/diy-feeltrue","title":null,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"DIY FeelTrue® Sandal Kits"}]},{"type":"text","value":"."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"If you would like to make an additional donation, you can do that here."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Note: We will pass your donation on to the TCHF when we make our own quarterly donation.  Because we are not a non-profit ourselves, we are not able to provide a receipt for tax deduction purposes.  If you need this kind of receipt, please make your donation to the TCHF directly by going to: "},{"type":"link","url":"https://www.tchforegon.org/donate","title":null,"target":"_blank","children":[{"type":"text","value":"https://www.tchforegon.org/donate"}]},{"type":"text","value":"."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Thank you for supporting the TCHF."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Start enjoying your Xero Shoes Genesis just moments after they arrive in your mailbox."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"It’s called the Genesis because it was inspired by our first product, our DIY sandal kit, and one of mankind’s first footwear designs. Then, of course, we updated it with the experience we’ve had and feedback we’ve gotten, from making barefoot-friendly sandals since 2009."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Why you’ll love the Genesis:"}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The right combination of barefoot-friendly ground feel plus protection, thanks to our exclusive 5mm FeelTrue® rubber outsoles"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Lightweight – men’s 42 is only 136 grams each"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Elegant contour to hold your foot, but without unnecessary support"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Pre-laced — just slide in your foot and go"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Patent-pending tension adjustment system — find the perfect fit in seconds, and then you can slide your Xeros on and off in a flash"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Super soft toe loop — since the huaraches-inspired lacing goes around your entire foot, you don’t feel the toe loop the way you do in a flip-flop or other thong sandal"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Nylon Achilles strap with Silicone grip — holds on securely and comfortably"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Elevated ankle holes — the lace never touches the ground, and so it won’t abrade"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Trim to fit — with just kitchen scissors, you can trim the Genesis to match your foot shape"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Vegan-friendly"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"5,000-mile sole warranty! {"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"You'll practically fly over your next trail when you're wearing the Mesa Trail."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"We made the Mesa Trail with lightweight, barefoot-friendly, minimalist running in mind. But we know you'll wear it off-trail too."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"You'll look great when you pair the Mesa Trail with your favorite jeans, and is comfortable enough for all-day wear."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The breathable, mesh upper gets rid of the weight and keeps you cool. The moisture-wicking lining helps keep you dry. The welded protective covering of the adjustable midfoot and instep straps adds durability. The lugged, dual-chevron tread gives you sure-footed traction. And the \"hidden\" 3mm TrailFoam™ layer adds the right amount of protection and comfort."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"PROTECTION THAT FEELS JUST RIGHT."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rThe Daylite Hiker Fusion features a new 10mm FeelTrue® sole that includes 3.5mm lugged dual chevron tread that has been re-designed to provide even more grip and control without sacrificing the ground feel and feedback you'd expect from Xero Shoes.\r\n"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"IMPROVED COMFORT AND DURABILITY."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rWe've tucked our Huarache-inspired tension straps under a sleek new welded upper so you can achieve a snug fit with even more splash and abrasion-resistance. {"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"You probably know how important it is to "},{"type":"text","value":"let your kids' feet develop and function naturally","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" -- letting their toes spread, and their feet bend, flex, move, and Feel the World!®"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"That's why we're thrilled to release "},{"type":"text","value":"the Kid's version of our best-selling Prio","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" barefoot/minimalist shoe for everything they love to do."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The Kids’ Prio has everything you love about the adult version, plus we’ve made a few changes, just for them:"}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"More grip!","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" We spaced out the lugs and made them bigger on the FeelTrue® soles to give them better traction."}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Ergonomic fit","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" We didn’t just shrink the adult Prio, we changed the shape for a better fit."}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Just-right feedback","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" We also thinned out the sole a little bit to make it extra flexible, give kids the right amount of ground-feel and protection."}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Unisex fit","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" Don’t worry about boys vs. girls, the Kids Prio is made for both."}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Of course, we’ve kept all the best things about the Prio:","bold":true}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Natural FIT — A wide toe box lets your toes spread and relax. Plus the “XERO-drop” sole (non-elevated heel and low-to-the-ground) allows for proper posture, balance, and agility"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Natural MOTION — The Prio is flexible enough to let little feet bend, move, and flex the way, well, that feet are "},{"type":"text","value":"supposed to","bold":true}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Lightweight — Your kids might even forget they’re wearing them"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Natural FEEL — Remove the 3mm insole for a more “barefoot feel,” or keep it in for a bit more protection"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"100% Vegan-friendly materials — No animal products are used in the Prio"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Huarache-inspired design — The huarache-sandal inspired strap helps secure the heel"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Adjustable instep strap — Use the “inverted V” straps aren’t sewn down to lock in the instep while keeping toes free to move"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Reflective straps — The middle strip in the heel and instep straps are highly reflective for evenings and night"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Barefoot-friendly — Wear the Prio with or without socks"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"5,000-mile sole warranty — like all our FeelTrue® soles, the Prio is backed by our 5,000-mile sole warranty*"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":""}]},{"type":"heading","level":3,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"A note about sizing"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The numbers for kids sizes change. The “Kids 12” is the smallest size, followed by Kids 13, then Youth 1-4."}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Worried about your kids outgrowing the Prio?"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"We know that kids grow, and we’re not fans of buying shoes “that they’ll grow into.”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"To help out if your kids get too big for their Prio, we’ve created a Facebook Group where you can trade/swap/buy/sell your shoes and pass your still-wearable pair to someone who still fits your size, and find a pair for the next perfect fit."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"(Note: The FB group is for use at your own discretion. {"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Thousands have taken our Prio running shoe out on the trail, but when you want more grip, more traction, and a bit more protection, you’ll want the"},{"type":"text","value":"TerraFlex","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":"."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The NEW TerraFlex","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" is a high-performance, true minimalist trail running and hiking shoe."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Built with the same DNA as our best-selling Prio, TerraFlex lets your feet move, bend, flex and feel, the way they’re meant to."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Then we’ve added a lugged sole for grip (6.5mm FeelTrue® sole including 4mm lugs), and embedded 3mm of BareFoam™ inside the sole for extra protection and comfort. Plus, a durable Tough Tek toe bumper and more aggressive breathable mesh upper."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Why you’ll love the TerraFlex","bold":true}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Natural FIT — A wide toe box lets your toes spread and relax. Plus the “XERO-drop” sole (non-elevated heel and low-to-the-ground) allows for proper posture, balance, and agility"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Natural MOTION — The TerraFlex is flexible enough to let your feet bend, move, and flex the way, well, that feet are "},{"type":"text","value":"supposed","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" to. Plus, they’re so lightweight, you’ll barely know you have them on. A women’s 7 is only 8.2 ounces each"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Natural FEEL — The TerraFlex uses our FeelTrue® rubber with a removable 3mm insole, to let you Feel The World®"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Vegan-friendly materials — No animal products in the TerraFlex"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Huarache-inspired design — The heel strap is not only eye-catching but functional"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Adjustable instep strap — The “inverted V” straps aren’t sewn down, so you can use them to lock in your instep while keeping your toes free to move"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Reflective straps — That middle section of the heel and instep straps are highly reflective for evenings and night"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Removable 2mm insole — For a more barefoot feeling, you can remove the optional 2mm insole"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Barefoot friendly — Wear the TerraFlex with or without socks"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"5,000-mile sole warranty — Like all our FeelTrue® soles, the TerraFlex is backed by our 5,000-mile sole warranty"}]}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":3,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Imagine a sport sandal with traction to take you wherever you want, with an “invisible” feeling like no other. That’s the Veracruz."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Our Chief Product Officer, Dennis Driscoll, literally dreamed the Veracruz into existence — he had to wake himself up to sketch this completely unique (and, now, patented) minimalist sport sandal webbing pattern."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Like our Jessie, the Veracruz has a comfortable, slightly stretchy, woven toe loop. And like our Z-Trail sandal, you’ll find a 3-layer FeelLite™ sole with:"}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"FeelTrue® rubber inserts for grip – including a new, more rugged tread under the ball of your foot"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"A TrailFoam™ middle layer to “even out the bumps”"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The BareFoam™ footbed with just enough cushion for comfort and performance"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Of course, the sole is backed with our 5,000 mile sole warranty"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"It’s the upper webbing pattern that’s so special — the strap that starts at the outside of your foot and loops around to become the heel strap, plus the separate instep strap. Both are adjustable to get the right fit."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"There’s something magical about the strapping system combined with the toe loop and the light weight (just 4.8 ounces for a men’s 9) that makes the Veracruz feel like there’s nothing on your foot. But the grippy outsole lets you know it’s ready for adventure."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"NOTE: Since there’s nothing else like the Veracruz in the world, we want to hear your thoughts and feedback about it. After you get your Veracruz, email or call us with any questions.","bold":true}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Imagine a sport sandal with traction to take you wherever you want, with an “invisible” feeling like no other. That’s the Veracruz."}],"level":3}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Our Chief Product Officer, Dennis Driscoll, literally dreamed the Veracruz into existence — he had to wake himself up to sketch this completely unique (and, now, patented) minimalist sport sandal webbing pattern."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Like our Jessie, the Veracruz has a comfortable, slightly stretchy, woven toe loop. And like our Z-Trail sandal, you’ll find a 3-layer FeelLite™ sole with:"}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"FeelTrue® rubber inserts for grip – including a new, more rugged tread under the ball of your foot"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"A TrailFoam™ middle layer to “even out the bumps”"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The BareFoam™ footbed with just enough cushion for comfort and performance"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Of course, the sole is backed with our 5,000 mile sole warranty"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"It’s the upper webbing pattern that’s so special — the strap that starts at the outside of your foot and loops around to become the heel strap, plus the separate instep strap. Both are adjustable to get the right fit."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"There’s something magical about the strapping system combined with the toe loop and the light weight (just 113 grams each for a women’s 37.5) that makes the Veracruz feel like there’s nothing on your foot. But the grippy outsole lets you know it’s ready for adventure."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"NOTE: Since there’s nothing else like the Veracruz in the world, we want to hear your thoughts and feedback about it. After you get your Veracruz, email or call us with any questions.","bold":true}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"This fully waterproof hiking boot is ready for the most extreme adventures! The Xcursion Fusion is a sleeker and more rugged version of the best-selling original."}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"WE MAKE SANDALS SO COMFORTABLE, YOU'LL FORGET THEY'RE EVEN ON."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"If your feet don't feel as good at the end of the day as they did in the beginning, you haven't tried the Z-Trail EV.","bold":true,"italic":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Life-changing comfort and superior performance come from letting your feet do what's natural – bend, move, flex and feel."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"All Xero Shoes feature a non-elevated \"zero drop\" heel for proper posture, low-to-the-ground design for perfect balance and agility, and a flexible sole that gives you “just right” protection so you can bend, move, flex, and safely Feel the World® in total comfort."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The Z-Trail EV features an updated 11 mm "},{"type":"text","value":"FeelLite™","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" sole with a middle layer of "},{"type":"text","value":"TrailFoam™","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" and an updated dual chevron lug pattern that offers the best combination of "},{"type":"text","value":"comfort","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":", "},{"type":"text","value":"protection","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":", and "},{"type":"text","value":"trail-ready traction","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" while still allowing you to bend, move, flex, and feel the terrain beneath your feet."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"At just 4.3 oz each for a women’s 7, the Z-Trail EV remains just as lightweight and packable as the original best-selling Z-Trail."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"This fully waterproof hiking boot is ready for the most extreme adventures! The Xcursion Fusion is a sleeker and more rugged version of the best-selling original."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"PROTECTION THAT FEELS JUST RIGHT."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rWith a new 10mm FeelTrue® sole, rugged dual chevron tread which includes 3.5mm lugs, as well as an embedded TrailFoam™ layer for added comfort and protection, the new Xcursion Fusion was designed to provide even more grip and control without sacrificing the ground feel and feedback you'd expect from Xero Shoes.\r\n"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"IMPROVED COMFORT AND DURABILITY."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rWe've tucked our Huarache-inspired tension straps under a sleek new welded upper so you can get a snug fit with even more abrasion resistance. Carried over from the previous model are features like the durable, protective toe cap, seam-sealed inner bootie, and a water-resistant membrane behind the outer mesh."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"At just 13.7 ounces each for a Men's 9, the Xcursion Fusion remains the perfect minimalist boot for backpacking, camping, trail hiking, or just about any adventure.\r\n"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"A FRESH, UPDATED LOOK."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rAvailable in deep black and earthy brown tones, the new Xcursion Fusion is a minimalist hiking boot that is rugged enough for the most demanding summits yet stylish enough to pair with just jeans, khakis, tactical pants, or just about any casual attire."}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"WE MAKE BOOTS SO COMFORTABLE, YOU'LL FORGET THEY'RE EVEN ON."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"If your feet don’t feel as good at the end of the day as they did in the beginning, you haven’t tried the Xcursion Fusion.","bold":true,"italic":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Life-changing comfort and superior performance come from letting your feet do what's natural – bend, move, flex and feel."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"All Xero Shoes feature a wider, foot-shaped toe box that lets your toes spread and relax, a non-elevated \"zero drop\" heel for proper posture, low-to-the-ground design for perfect balance and agility, and a flexible sole that gives you \"just right\" protection so you can bend, move, flex, and safely Feel the World® in total comfort."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":3,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"We started with our best-selling trail hiking and running shoe, the TerraFlex, and morphed it into a high-topped, fully waterproof hiking boot that’s ready for your next extreme adventure. Meet the Xcursion."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Here’s how the Xcursion gives you the protection you want:"}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Gusseted tongue and sealed waterproof inner liner"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Additional water-repellent membrane inside the outer mesh"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Durable protective toe cap, foxing, and accents"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Just 12 ounces each for a men’s size 9, the minimalist Xcursion boot feels like no hiker you’ve ever worn. In fact, whether you’re on a day hike or fully loaded with a heavy pack, the Xcursion gives you the grip and support you want while still feeling like a “barefoot boot.”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The other reasons you’ll love the Xcursion are its true Xero Shoes heritage:"}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"A wide toe box — lets your toes spread, splay and move naturally"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Low-to-the-ground design for balance and agility"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Non-elevated, “zero-drop” heel for proper posture"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The flexible sole lets your feet bend and move the way they’re supposed to"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"High-traction FeelTrue® rubber sole with dual-chevron tread for traction, backed by our 5,000 mile sole warranty"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Lightweight construction for “barely there” comfort"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Vegan-friendly materials"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Let’s see what adventure you take on in your Xcursion. {"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":3,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"NOTE — The styles on this page are on clearance because the new Hana features our “rain-friendly” canvas. "},{"type":"link","url":"/products/hana","title":null,"target":null,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Click Here"}]},{"type":"text","value":" for that product."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Get the freedom of our best-selling sandals with an elegant closed-toe style and casual hemp canvas comfort","bold":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"For years, people have told us, “We LOVE our sandals, but what do we do when it’s cold out, or when I need something with closed-toes for work, or if I need a bit more protection?”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The Hana is the answer.","bold":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The Hana is, first and foremost, a casual shoe.  But since it’s built on our high-performance FeelTrue® sandal base, it’ll handle much more."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Natural FIT — a wide toe box lets your toes spread and relax. Plus the “XERO-drop” sole (non-elevated heel and low-to-the-ground) allows for proper posture, balance, and agility."}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Natural FUNCTION — the Hana is flexible enough to let your feet bend, move, and flex the way, well, that feet are "},{"type":"text","value":"supposed","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" to. Plus, they’re so lightweight, you’ll barely know you have them on. A men’s 9 is only 8 ounces each."}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Natural FEEL — the Hana uses the same 5.5mm FeelTrue® rubber sole from our Z-Trek sandal, so you get great protection while still getting the ground feedback that your feet like. With an optional 3mm insole, the Hana truly lets you Feel The World®."}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Vegan-friendly materials — the Hana’s upper is hemp canvas, the lining and external accents are microfiber. It washes easily with soap and water."}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Huarache-inspired design — the heel/instep strap is not only eye-catching but functional."}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Flexible heel — feel free to step on the heel and wear the Hana as a slide"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Plus, Hana now has a new, “Rain-Friendly” upper."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"BTW, “Rain-Friendly” isn’t the same as “waterproof.” Fully water-proof shoes have a technical liner, sealed seams, and a "},{"type":"text","value":"much","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":" higher price. By pre-treating the Hana with a water-resistant coating, you get an extra layer of protection against light splashing right out of the box."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"As with all treatments of this type, it will wear off over time, so we recommend re-treating as you would other water sensitive footwear regularly depending on use."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"FEEL CONNECTED TO YOUR WORLD WHEN YOU RUN OR HIKE IN THE TERRAFLEX II"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"SECURE, TRAIL-GRIPPING COMFORT."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rWhether you're running, hiking, or simply taking a casual stroll off the beaten path, the TerraFlex II helps you feel more connected to the ground beneath your feet."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The rugged 6.5mm FeelTrue® sole, including 4mm lugs for confident traction, provides the perfect combination of protection and ground feel for any off-road activity. The embedded 3mm layer of TrailFoam™ provides added comfort and protection and the toe bumper helps guard against unexpected bumps you encounter along your way."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Finally, our huarache-inspired heel cinch and mid-foot webbing remain fully adjustable, giving you a secure and stable fit throughout your adventure, while the iconic wider toe box lets your toes splay and flex to empower your stride.\r\n"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"LIGHTWEIGHT PROTECTION THAT FEELS JUST RIGHT."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rAt just 8.3 oz for a women's size 7, the TerraFlex II is even lighter than the original, placing it just between our ultra-lightweight Mesa Trail running shoe and the multi-purpose DayLite Hiker Fusion boot. This is one hiking shoe that won't slow you down, keeping you going from trailhead to summit."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Looking for a stronger stimulation and more powerful impact on the proprioceptive system while you’re wearing shoes? Put a Naboso textured insole in your Xero Shoes!"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"“Naboso” means “barefoot” in Czech, and the Naboso technology and Naboso insoles were developed by "},{"type":"text","value":"Dr. Emily Splichal","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":", a podiatrist committed to natural movement and the benefits barefoot."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"My (Steven Sashen) personal experience with Naboso was, frankly, surprising. For years, I’ve tried various “stimulating” insoles and never noticed anything other than how uncomfortable they were."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"So it was with great trepidation that I tried the Naboso proprioceptive insoles. After all, didn’t want to call Emily and tell her that they, like all the insoles before them, had no effect!"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Naboso"},{"type":"text","value":"® "},{"type":"text","value":"\"Activation\" Insole Features:","bold":true}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"1.5mm patent-pending pyramidal two-point discrimination texture"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"3mm total thickness"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Higher level stimulation to increase energy and offset fatigue"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Freedom of rotation to support movement efficiency"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Cut to your own size options"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Recommended for:","bold":true}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Use at work, in the gym and throughout the day"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Enhancing foot awareness to improve balance & increase movement efficiency"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Maximum foot stimulation to energize your step and reduce foot ache"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Improving postural awareness and balance when standing and walking"}]}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Naboso"},{"type":"text","value":"®"},{"type":"text","value":" "},{"type":"text","value":"Performance\" Insole Features:","bold":true}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"1.5mm patent-pending two point discrimination texture"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"3mm total thickness"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Moderate level stimulus to enhance performance"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Freedom of rotation and movement to increase agility"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Thin enough to fit into any cleat or athletic shoe"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Cut to your own size options"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Recommended for:","bold":true}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Use on the field, court or track"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Enhancing foot awareness to improve speed and reaction time"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Enhancing skin perfusion and peripheral nerve stimulation"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Improving postural awareness and balance when in motion"}]}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":2,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Naboso® insoles in a Sandal?"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"If you are interested in using Naboso foot stimulating technology with sandals, you are in luck! Xero Shoes has partnered with Naboso to bring you the \"Naboso Trail\", a special version of our classic Z-Trail Sandal, and the world's first sandal with proprioceptive technology built-in!"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Naboso"},{"type":"text","value":"® Duo Insole Features:","bold":true}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Reversible, dual-stimulating silicone"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Combines the \"Activation\" and \"Performance\" insole products into one, with 1.5mm patent-pending pyramidal two-point discrimination texture on one side and 1.5mm patent-pending two point discrimination texture on the other side."}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"3mm total thickness"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Higher level stimulation to increase energy and offset fatigue"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Freedom of rotation to support movement efficiency"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Cut to your own size options"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Recommended for:","bold":true}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Use at work, in the gym and throughout the day"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Enhancing foot awareness to improve balance & increase movement efficiency"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Maximum foot stimulation to energize your step and reduce foot ache"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Improving postural awareness and balance when standing and walking"}]}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The all-purpose Prio is our #1 selling shoe. In this addition to the Prio line, you'll still enjoy the breathable upper and its \"do anything\" functionality."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Even better with its suede accents and gum rubber sole, you'll love how the Prio Suede fits with more of your wardrobe and your life."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"You can add Naboso insoles in ANY of our shoes and boots, but since the Naboso insole colors match some of our HFS colors, we're showing them off together in the pics at the top of the page."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Use the size guide, below for your Naboso insoles. Remember, you can trim them to fit, so if you're unsure, go up a size."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Feel comfy and secure with the huarache sandal-inspired heel, instep, and midfoot straps. The Prio Suede is made to wear with or without socks. At just 9.4 oz  (for each Men’s size 9), you might forget you’re even wearing shoes."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Taking athleisure to a new level, we’ve updated our bestselling “do-everything” Prio by giving it a retro design and sleek, suede upper. We wanted to create a retro-inspired footwear design that's versatile, to take you from the office to a night out, while still including the features you love in our Xero DNA."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"I didn’t have to make that call because I was shocked by the effect...","italic":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"I trimmed them to fit my Prio shoes, replaced the insoles in my Prio with the Nabosos, and wore the insoles for a few hours — I could FEEL them, but they weren’t too uncomfortable. When I took them off is when the surprise hit me."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"As I walked around barefoot, I could feel my feet engaging more, gripping more. They felt stronger and more active. My calves, too, felt like they were spring-loaded. I had more bounce in my step."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"I keep the Naboso insoles in my Prio for every activity — for walking, running, hiking, working out. Every now and then, though, I give my feet and my nervous system a “rest” — either by wearing a different shoe, or taking out the Naboso insoles."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Some people wear "},{"type":"text","value":"thin ","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":"socks when they want a bit less stimulation."}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"YOUR FAVORITE SHOE FOR ALL YOU DO"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"If you could only have one pair of shoes, the Prio Suede would be a perfect choice. Like the original Prio, it has a breathable mesh upper. This upgraded version with suede accents is ready for office or evening wear, but will also handle a sudden sprint."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"When it’s a cold and damp day, you’ll look forward to slipping into the leather version of our best-selling men’s boot, the Denver."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"With its barefoot-friendly design, water-repellant Nubuck leather upper, cozy lining, heat-reflective insole, and grippy lugged treads, you may wish that warm weather never comes."}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"FEEL CONNECTED TO YOUR WORLD IN THE PRIO SUEDE"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"LIGHTWEIGHT COMFORT AND STABILITY."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rIf you travel and need to pack just one shoe, the Prio Suede performs, offering our classic, low-to-the-ground FeelTrue® sole.\r\n"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"\"JUST-RIGHT\" PROTECTION."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rAnd if you break out into a run to avoid the paparazzi, the Prio Suede handles that in comfort with the wider, foot-shaped toe box, non-elevated heel, and flexible FeelTrue® rubber sole that’s backed with our 5,000 mile sole warranty."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Just like the original, the Prio Suede's huarache sandal-inspired reflective heel and instep straps hold your foot securely – with or without socks – while keeping your toes free to move."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Let your feet feel as good at the end of the day as they did at the start in the Prio Suede."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The Neuro Ball can be used as a release ball to roll under your feet, in the palms of your hands or over your calves. You can also split the ball into two dome shapes for a stationary tool that gives you more control over pressure and static holds while specifically targeting an area like the sole of your foot. You can also use the bonus Micro Round to further target hard-to-reach areas between the small bones of your feet and hands for a comprehensive, multi-treatment approach to giving yourself the best care."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":""},{"type":"text","value":"NABOSO® TECHNOLOGY","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":"
Naboso’s patent-pending technology covers the surface of the Neuro Ball for enhanced sensory stimulation."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":""},{"type":"text","value":"ALL-IN-ONE DESIGN","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":"
Split it in two for stationary exercises that let you work both feet simultaneously or use it for rolling techniques all over the body. Bonus, inside the Neuro Ball is a firm Micro Round for detail work."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":""},{"type":"text","value":"IDEAL DENSITY","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":"
With so many nerves in your hands and feet finding the right density balance is critical. The Neuro Ball is firm enough to be effective, soft enough to be comfortable."}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"WE MAKE SHOES SO COMFORTABLE, YOU'LL FORGET THEY'RE EVEN ON."}]}]}

Get extra lateral stability with the midfoot strap, molded sidewall, and grippy tread.\r\n"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"LIGHTWEIGHT MESH BOOTIE"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rThe bootie-like construction and moisture-wicking, silky smooth lining makes the Forza trainer so comfortable you can wear them to the gym, in the gym, from the gym, and everywhere else you go."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"At just 7.4oz for a Women’s size 7, you may forget you’re wearing them!"}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"WE MAKE TRAINING SHOES SO COMFORTABLE, YOU'LL FORGET THEY'RE EVEN ON."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"If your feet don't feel as good at the end of the day as they did in the beginning, you haven't tried the Forza Trainer.","bold":true,"italic":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Life-changing comfort and superior performance come from letting your feet do what's natural – bend, move, flex and feel."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"All Xero Shoes feature a wider, foot-shaped toe box that lets your toes spread and relax, a non-elevated \"zero drop\" heel for proper posture, low-to-the-ground design for better balance and agility, and a flexible sole that gives you the combination of grip, protection, and ground-feel your brain wants to help you "},{"type":"text","value":"Live Life Feet First","bold":true},{"type":"text","value":"."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Ever have that feeling at the end of a hike where you can’t wait to kick off your heavy, stiff boots?"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"You’ll never feel that again when you wear the Scrambler Mid, perhaps the lightest and most comfortable technical hiking boot ever made!"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Scramble up trails like a mountain goat in this shoe! At just 267 grams. per shoe (W37.5), a pair of the Scrambler Mid weighs less than just one single boot from most other companies."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"LIKE WEARING MOUNTAIN BIKE TIRES ON YOUR FEET"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"
Scrambler Mid is a collaboration with Michelin, the car and bike tire company."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"If you could see inside the thin Michelin fiberlite sole, you’d find an embedded textile layer, giving the sole unparalleled strength, flexibility and lightness."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Plus, with mud-shedding lugs inspired by Michelin’s high-performance mountain bike tires, you feel the confidence that comes with incredible grip."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Although the Scrambler Mid uses Michelin soles, it's still covered under our 5,000 mile sole warranty.
"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"EXTRA PROTECTION WITH AN “ILLUSION”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"
You may look at the Scrambler Mid and think it has a thick sole and that Xero Shoes has strayed from our mission."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Far from it."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Above the fiberlite is a thin layer of our TrailFoam™, which gives you extra comfort and protection when you’re on a tough trail."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Normally we hide this layer in our hiking products’ soles. But the Scrambler Mid wraps both sole layers up around the upper, giving an illusion of thickness. This eye-catching look inspires conversations with other hikers that start with, “Where do I get those?”"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"TOUGH FROM TOE TO HEEL"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\nEnjoy the protection you get with the Scrambler Mid’s abrasion-resistant, vegan-friendly, breathable upper, and welded sidewalls and two-layer toe cap."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"And when the elements give you an extra challenge, attach your favorite gaiter to the included hook and tackle the next peak."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"A “RUNNING BOOT?”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\nWith this incredible combination of lightness, flexibility, grip, protection, and comfort, the Scrambler Mid can outperform many trail running shoes."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Whether you put that idea to the test, or take it for a day trip, or a month-long thru-hike, the Scrambler Mid is your perfect companion to Live Life Feet First."}]}]}

(M9), the Ridgeway is lighter than most technical boots, but even lighter than many running shoes."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Embrace brisk mountain mornings, wet trails, or cozy evenings by the fire with the confidence that your Ridgeway boots have your back."}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Scrambler Low – Your Ultralight Hiking and Trail Running Shoe"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Get ready to race, hike, scramble, and explore in style with the Scrambler Low – perhaps the lightest, most comfortable, and breathable trail shoe you’ve ever encountered."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Our second collaboration with Michelin, the Scrambler Low, redefines performance, comfort, and versatility."}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"WE MAKE HIKING SHOES SO COMFORTABLE, YOU'LL FORGET THEY'RE EVEN ON."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"If your feet don’t feel as good at the end of the day as they did in the beginning, you haven’t tried the Ridgeway.","bold":true,"italic":true}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Life-changing comfort and superior performance come from letting your feet do what’s natural – bend, move, flex and feel."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"All Xero Shoes feature a wider, foot-shaped toe box that lets your toes spread and relax, a non-elevated “zero drop” heel for proper posture, low-to-the-ground design for perfect balance and agility, and a flexible sole that gives you “just right” protection so you can bend, move, flex, and "},{"type":"text","value":"Live Life Feet First!","bold":true}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Tire Inspired Design"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":""}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The Scrambler Low shares the Michelin made, mountain bike tire-inspired outsole with its sibling, our Scrambler Mid."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":""}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":""}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The sole uses Michelin’s fiberlite technology, an embedded textile layer that creates a thin, lightweight, flexible, strong product."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":""}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Lightweight, Breathable, and Confident"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":""}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"At just 9.3 oz. per shoe (M9), the Scrambler Low weighs less than many hiking sandals."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"You’ll enjoy the breathable mesh upper year round."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The iconic Xero Shoes adjustable instep and midfoot straps will help you feel secure no matter where you take the Scrambler Low."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":""}]}]}
{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"SPEED FORCE II – Speed and Power with Barefoot Feel"}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"If you’re looking for the closest thing to a true barefoot experience, look no further than the Speed Force II – a stylish upgrade to our original Speed Force."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Steven Sashen, our CEO, Co-Founder, and Masters All-American sprinter designed the Speed Force with a former Nike developer. It’s the shoe he trains and races in."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Since we released the original Speed Force, people have worn this ultra lightweight shoe for working out, pickleball, taking a stroll and everything in between."}]}]}

If you take out the removable insole for an even more barefoot feel, the shoe weighs even less!"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The biggest change: a new, elegant, super-breathable upper with welded components for extra durability.\r\n"}]},{"type":"heading","level":4,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"A Secure, Barefoot Experience"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"\rThe iconic, adjustable instep and midfoot straps are not only eye-catching, but functional, giving you a confident, secure feeling for whatever you do in the Speed Force II."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"With a flexible 4.5 mm thick FeelTrue™ rubber sole, your brain gets the feedback it needs to help you move effectively, efficiently, and enjoyably."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The dual chevron tread grips the ground and, like all Xero Shoes, Speed Force II is backed with our 5,000 mile sole warranty."}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"We’ll let Xero Shoes expert, Randy Kreill, tell you about the Genesis:"}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Start enjoying your Xero Shoes Genesis just moments after they arrive in your mailbox."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"It’s called the Genesis because it was inspired by our first product, our DIY sandal kit, and one of mankind’s first footwear designs. Then, of course, we updated it with the experience we’ve had and feedback we’ve gotten, from making barefoot-friendly sandals since 2009."}]},{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Why you’ll love the Genesis:"}]},{"type":"list","listType":"unordered","children":[{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The right combination of barefoot-friendly ground feel plus protection, thanks to our exclusive 5mm FeelTrue® rubber outsoles"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Lightweight – men’s 9 is only 4.6 ounces each"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Elegant contour to hold your foot, but without unnecessary support"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Pre-laced — just slide in your foot and go"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Patent-pending tension adjustment system — find the perfect fit in seconds, and then you can slide your Xeros on and off in a flash"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Super soft toe loop — since the huaraches-inspired lacing goes around your entire foot, you don’t feel the toe loop the way you do in a flip-flop or other thong sandal"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Nylon Achilles strap with Silicone grip — holds on securely and comfortably"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Elevated ankle holes — the lace never touches the ground, and so it won’t abrade"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Trim to fit — with just kitchen scissors, you can trim the Genesis to match your foot shape"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"Vegan-friendly"}]},{"type":"list-item","children":[{"type":"text","value":"5,000-mile sole warranty! ("},{"type":"link","url":"/pages/warranty","title":"Xero Shoes 5,000 Mile Warranty","target":null,"children":[{"type":"text","value":"Details here"}]},{"type":"text","value":")."}]}]}]}

{"type":"root","children":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"type":"text","value":"The Alpine Pull-On doesn’t just keep your feet warm, it keeps them dry, too – a must-have for staying comfortable in the cold weather.
